item.title: hexdevs Watch Party
item.description: Do you know all the amazing tech talks sitting on your Watch later list? Sounds more like a Never Watch list, right? ‚åõü§≠ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è If you’d like to watch a tech talk and hang out with other devs, then join the hexdevs Watch Party! We host online interactive workshops with guided questions to help you effectively learn from the talk. It’s fun and you get to engage in a discussion with other devs about the topics.
